body: 这种出现多种颜色的情况建议用 `legend` 来设置吧，感觉不算 bug

> 我用的时候也发现了这个问题，我测的节点数量超过967时会出现这种情况，我的同事测的是超过1075个节点时出现了这种情况，题主最后有什么优化方案吗？

暂时也没找到办法，只有把节点数减少呗。
In [the exampe of 4.2.1](https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xO7v7zJU8P&v=1), all 600 points can be selected
@19mariusz95 Have you defined `min` and `max` in `visualMap`?
I'm not sure what `halflen` means, but you should access series index by `component.seriesIndex` and data index by `component.dataIndex`.
sorry, VisualMap doesn't support multiple dimensions yet.
@sunyuu Thanks for your explanation. I'm not quite sure about this. @100pah please have a look.

I updated the example to make the issue more clear. Please take another look.
The values returned from component.value are from the incorrect series.

The correct values should returned from the formatter in the left graph should be 11, 12, 13. However, what's being displayed is 11, **22**, and 13. This is because the data values in the formatter's component object are coming from series[dataIndex], when it should be returning data from series[seriesIndex]. 

 @Ovilia
@earlymeme Can you provide an example of how to use this feature?

> sorry, VisualMap doesn't support multiple dimensions yet.

Is there any plan to achieve this?
@Ende93  怎么给单个图例设置颜色呢，只能给图例的文本设置吧
这个问题解决了吗

Hi there,

I have just cleared my cache and still I get the same error. When I say error I mean that the chart appears but it is empty and also it says "error exists in code".

Now I get a javascript error:
```
editor.js?_v_=1548453467689:434 TypeError: Cannot read property '__focusNodeAdjacency' of undefined
    at echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22
    at SL.ML.eachEdge (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
    at i.render (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
    at gr.progress (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
    at mr (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
    at gr.UI.perform (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
    at echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22
    at i.<anonymous> (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at d (echarts.min.js?_v_=1548453467689:22)
```

@ClemMakesApps can you send me the link where you see the page working ?

Also from what I see this type of coordinate system "calendar" used in this example is missing from the documentation. https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#series-graph.coordinateSystem

Thanks !

您好，打扰了，能说下是什么原因导致会出现这样的问题么？可以通过修改源码解决么？

主题: Re: [apache/incubator-echarts] series.graph节点数量大于1010时focusNodeAdjacency不能显示label (#9143)



 
我用的时候也发现了这个问题，我测的节点数量超过967时会出现这种情况，我的同事测的是超过1075个节点时出现了这种情况，题主最后有什么优化方案吗？
  
暂时也没找到办法，只有把节点数减少呗。

How to Choose Legend of Histogram with Series Data,sorry,My English is not good

> effectScatter因为动画效果的缘故，是很耗费性能的，建议不要全部加载，可以使用图层类似的设计，通过缩放地图加载/隐藏某些scatter，或者采用聚合标记的思路，先使用普通scatter，然后放大地图到合适的zoom的时候，再切换为effectScatter。话说你500+个scatter如果全在屏幕上，估计也密密麻麻了。

thanks，不过这和动效没关系，最近考虑离太近的点只显示一个，先这样优化下吧

没仔细去查到底什么问题导致的。能不能修改源码解决那得看你自己改不改得动啦。

> Please also update [doc](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-doc/) and paste the PR here.

update doc https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts-doc/pull/40
@Ovilia Hi, The ICLA file has been sent. thanks.

Never though about the `itemStyle.color`, I think that the color of legend shoud the same as line not the symbol style. But for back compat?I could try to set `lineStyle.color` when `itemStyle.color` is `undefined`.Is that ok?
哦，我记错了...
也可以拆成多个 series 来解决

@Ovilia Hi. I have a specific case when there is a set of about 9000 series with 3 values or 3 series with 9000 values. In the first case, the performance drops dramatically (drawing the graph takes more than a minute) with respect to the second case, when it takes only a few seconds. Is there a way to increase productivity? I tried to use dataset (it got worse), set the property `large` to true and disable animation. ECharts v4.1.0

We cannot assume item color is the same as line color.
For the time being, please wait for @100pah for the view.
Sorry. Closed by mistake. Reopened.

@MINDoSOFT I am using https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=calendar-graph which is the same link in my original screenshot with the original error.

I've also clicked the `run` button to re-run the example, and it does not give me an error

We are using the same url indeed, but I am still seeing the error. 

Also I tested it on windows with internet explorer, and multiple computers and I still get the exception an no data on the echart (like your original exception screenshot).

Thanks for your time. If you have any idea how this can be fixed let me know.
Please increase your data to 3000, and test it once again.
不好意思，找到问题原因了。是我们自己的库影响到了echarts的库，才导致echarts报错了。
Oh, find it half day, It's here. It has been tested and fixed, thank you!

i do not define a new symbol type, when `symbolType` is the `function` type, it invoked and return the

Hello there,
I have located the problem, it has to do with the links in the echart configuration. Once I comment out the links, the charts display properly.

This problem happens with every chart that contains links e.g. 

- https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=calendar-graph 
- https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=calendar-charts

Best regards,
Sergios.

Sorry, but please ask *how-to* questions on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/echarts). Here's why:

Maintaining open source projects, especially popular ones, is [hard work](https://nolanlawson.com/2017/03/05/what-it-feels-like-to-be-an-open-source-maintainer/). As ECharts's user base has grown, we are getting more and more usage questions, bug reports, feature requests and pull requests every single day.

As a free and open source project, ECharts also has limited maintainer bandwidth. That means the only way to ensure the project's sustainability is to:

1. Prioritize more concrete work (bug fixes and new features);
2. Improve issue triaging efficiency.

For (1), we have decided to use the GitHub issue lists exclusively for work that has well-defined, actionable goals. Questions and open ended discussions should be posted to mediums that are better suited for them.

For (2), we have found that issues that do not provide proper information upfront usually results in terribly inefficient back-and-forth communication just to extract the basic information needed for actual triaging. This is exactly why we have created this app: to ensure that every issue is created with the necessary information, and to save time on both sides.

为什么框选总是不停的重新渲染？能不能不重新渲染，直接实现框选？
目前选框的时候需要更新图形的样式，甚至更复杂的视觉编码

In https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=calendar-graph if I remove the first element of graphData, the example works.

![screenshot from 2019-02-20 16-11-43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/53097527-57d53580-352a-11e9-9912-fd448b2f398f.png)

Also the same thing with the https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-examples/public/editor.html?c=calendar-charts example.

![screenshot from 2019-02-20 16-12-56](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/890368/53097617-8f43e200-352a-11e9-947e-c5e524fb4b96.png)

The cause of this problem is this data (in both cases) : 
```
    [
        1485878400000,
        260
    ],
```
although I don't know why they are causing it.
现在大数据量的散点图，框选有没有什么解决方案呢

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

Have a nice day! 🍵

Reasonable. Thanks.
The visualMap needed to support mapping customization.

And a temporary solution: 
Make an extra dimension to mark that whether use different color, and visualMap uses the dimension.

I have tried on Chrome 74.0.3712.0 (Official Build) canary (64-bit) (macOS 10.13.5) 
using the link <https://www.echartsjs.com/examples/editor.html?c=area-basic>. 
It seems to work normally.

Could I have your OS info?

@Ovilia https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/9898
This issue was closed by echarts-robot, without a solution. It was assigned to @100pah

> Reasonable. Thanks.
> The visualMap needed to support mapping customization.
> 
> And a temporary solution:
> Make an extra dimension to mark that whether use different color, and visualMap uses the dimension.

Thanks for your reply, I have tried your temporary solution to solve my problem already, and it is working properly for now.

> 是否设置过采样呢？
@100pah @Ovilia 
设置了 sampling:"average"!
` {
      name: val.name,
      type: 'line',
      smooth: true,
      symbol: 'circle',
      symbolSize: 8,
      sampling: 'average',
      connectNulls: true,
      clipOverflow: false,
      data: echartsData.seriesDataValue
}; `

> Seems to be fixed. Please try 4.2.1-rc1.

The version 4.2.1-rc1 is OK ， thank you

@kevinw0123 Sorry for the trouble. The robot listened on the issue editing, and closed after he thought this was not using the new template. Your clicking checkbox changed the issue so that triggered robot logic. I've now removed the issue edit listener and hope this will no longer confuse the old issues.
